fields.title: Political and Economic Situation in Lima, Peru, June, 1993

dsDescription.dsDescriptionValue: This study examined the political and economic situation in Lima, Peru. Issues addressed include main problems in Lima, the economic situation of the family and how it has changed in the past six months, Presidential re-election, terrorism, and the Shining Path. Demographic data gathered include sex, education, past voting behavior, household composition, and ownership of luxury items.

fields.notesText: Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: The survey used a probability sample of adults residents of Lima, Peru; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:ACCESS.CATEGORY  Notes: II;
